text: Meilleur restaurant pour bruncher a Montréal! J'y vais depuis de nombreuses années. Le staff est toujours souriant et sympathique et le service est ultra rapide. Tout sur le menu est excellent. Les portions sont très généreuses. Leur nouveau local est bien situé avec beaucoup plus de stationnement qu'avant, c'est très grand, bien rénové et bien éclairé.
Tried the omelette and crepe. Both were very bland . Even the potatoes tasted like chicken broth. Was very disappointed .

Place is nice aswell as the people who work there.But food wasn't great..i had the 2 eggs,3 meats,banana-chocolate crepe..it also came with beans coffee toasts and some fruits they offer as starters.honestly i personally didn't like anything ...except the fruits.and well..the eggs.the beans had a weird after taste,the crepe was a sorry excuse of a crepe considering most competitors and also had an after taste..maybe it was just the type of chocolate or the crepe mix..not sure.the bacon was ok..on the very thin side,sausage did not taste good to me,ham was thinly sliced..whatever.potatoes over seasonned.coffee..well it was filtered coffee..tasted ok not good.my brown toasts well done were a bit dense,not crispy.besides all that...i saw some ladies ordering egg benedicts ....and it sure looked delicious!!!
Une très belle place, belle ambiance, la serveuse qui nous a servies étais était Très professionnel... Je n'ai rien à dire de négatif .
